long_description: Designed to work with the Thule Pack n' Pedal Handlebar Mount (sold separately), the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Smartphone Attachment mounts virtually any smartphone to your handlebars for easy viewing. Side grips keep device in place while allowing full access to ports and controls. Rotates 360deg for portrait or landscape viewing. Rubberized platform prevents slipping. Compatible with virtually any smartphone, with or without case, up to 3.5 in. wide.
